trans-unit.source: Represents a custom binding element that supports channel security using asymmetric encryption.
trans-unit.target: Representa um elemento de enlace personalizado que suporta segurança de canal, utilizando a encriptação assimétrica.

trans-unit.source: This binding element signs the message using the sender's authentication token and encrypts the message using the recipient's token.
trans-unit.target: Este elemento de enlace inicia a mensagem com o token de autenticação do remetente e encripta a mensagem a utilizar o token do destinatário.

trans-unit.source: A custom binding contains a collection of binding elements arranged in a specific order: the element that represents the top of the binding stack is added first, the next element down in the binding stack, is added second, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: Um enlace personalizado contém uma coleção de elementos dispostos por uma ordem específica de enlace: o elemento que representa o topo da pilha de enlace for adicionado pela primeira vez, o próximo elemento para baixo na pilha de enlace, é adicionada segundo, etc.

trans-unit.source: To add this class to a binding 1.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar esta classe para um enlace de 1.

trans-unit.source: Create a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElementCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Criar um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElementCollection>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElementCollection>

trans-unit.source: Create custom binding elements that is above this binding element in the binding stack, such as the optional <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReliableSessionBindingElement>.
trans-unit.target: Criar elementos de enlace personalizado que é superior este elemento de enlace na pilha de enlace, tais como opcionais <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement>e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReliableSessionBindingElement>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReliableSessionBindingElement> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: Add the created elements in the preceding order to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElementCollection> using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElementCollection.InsertItem%28System.Int32%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement%29> method.
trans-unit.target: Adicionar os elementos criados pela ordem anterior para o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElementCollection>utilizando o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElementCollection.InsertItem%28System.Int32%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement%29>método.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElementCollection.InsertItem%28System.Int32%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement%29> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElementCollection>

trans-unit.source: Create an instance of AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement and add it to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Criar uma instância do AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement e adicione-a na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Add any additional custom binding elements to the collection, such as <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TcpTransportBindingElement>.
trans-unit.target: Adicionar quaisquer elementos de enlace personalizados adicionais para a coleção, tais como <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TcpTransportBindingElement>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TcpTransportBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: Before using this class, you should determine if a standard binding meets your security requirements.
trans-unit.target: Antes de utilizar esta classe, deve determinar se um enlace padrão cumpre os requisitos de segurança.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Once an instance of this object is created, you should treat the properties of its base class <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement> as immutable.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Quando é criada uma instância deste objeto, deve tratar as propriedades da respetiva classe base <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement>como imutável.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: Calling set on some properties may have unpredictable effects: the binding may behave as if the property retained its old value, with a run-time failure being the only indication of an issue.
trans-unit.target: Chamar definido para algumas propriedades pode ter efeitos imprevisíveis: o enlace pode se comporte como se a propriedade retidos valor antigo, com uma falha de tempo de execução que está a ser a única indicação de um problema.

trans-unit.source: Two properties known to behave this way are <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.IssuedSecurityTokenParameters.KeyType%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.MessageSecurityVersion%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Duas propriedades conhecidas comportar-se desta forma estão <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.IssuedSecurityTokenParameters.KeyType%2A>e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.MessageSecurityVersion%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.MessageSecurityVersion%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.IssuedSecurityTokenParameters.KeyType%2A>

trans-unit.source: There may be other properties this is true of.
trans-unit.target: Poderão existir outras propriedades, que isto é verdadeiro do.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma instância desta classe.

trans-unit.source: The following members are set by this constructor: |Member|Value| |------------|-----------| |<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.MessageProtectionOrder%2A>|<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessageProtectionOrder>| |<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.RequireSignatureConfirmation%2A>|`false`| |<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.InitiatorTokenParameters%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.RecipientTokenParameters%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.AllowSerializedSigningTokenOnReply%2A>|`false`|
trans-unit.target: Os seguintes membros são definidos por este construtor: | Membro | Valor | |------------|-----------| | <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.MessageProtectionOrder%2A>| <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessageProtectionOrder>| | <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.RequireSignatureConfirmation%2A>| `false`| | <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.InitiatorTokenParameters%2A>| `null`| | <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.RecipientTokenParameters%2A>| `null`| | <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.AllowSerializedSigningTokenOnReply%2A>| `false`|</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.AllowSerializedSigningTokenOnReply%2A></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.RecipientTokenParameters%2A></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.InitiatorTokenParameters%2A></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.RequireSignatureConfirmation%2A></xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessageProtectionOrder></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.MessageProtectionOrder%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement"></xref> with the specified recipient token parameters.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement"> </xref> com os parâmetros de token destinatários especificados.

trans-unit.source: The following members are set by this constructor: |Member|Value| |------------|-----------| |<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.MessageProtectionOrder%2A>|<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessageProtectionOrder>| |<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.RequireSignatureConfirmation%2A>|`false`| |<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.InitiatorTokenParameters%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.RecipientTokenParameters%2A>|`recipientTokenParameters`| |<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.AllowSerializedSigningTokenOnReply%2A>|`false`|
trans-unit.target: Os seguintes membros são definidos por este construtor: | Membro | Valor | |------------|-----------| | <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.MessageProtectionOrder%2A>| <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessageProtectionOrder>| | <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.RequireSignatureConfirmation%2A>| `false`| | <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.InitiatorTokenParameters%2A>| `null`| | <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.RecipientTokenParameters%2A>| `recipientTokenParameters`| | <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.AllowSerializedSigningTokenOnReply%2A>| `false`|</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.AllowSerializedSigningTokenOnReply%2A></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.RecipientTokenParameters%2A></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.InitiatorTokenParameters%2A></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.RequireSignatureConfirmation%2A></xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessageProtectionOrder></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.MessageProtectionOrder%2A>

trans-unit.source: Defines the token for the recipient (for example, the server's X.509 certificate).
trans-unit.target: Define o token para o destinatário (por exemplo, o certificado do servidor x.&509;).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement"></xref> with the specified recipient and initiator token parameters.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement"> </xref> com os destinatário e iniciador token os parâmetros especificados.

trans-unit.source: The following members are set by this constructor: |Member|Value| |------------|-----------| |<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.MessageProtectionOrder%2A>|<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessageProtectionOrder>| |<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.RequireSignatureConfirmation%2A>|`false`| |<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.InitiatorTokenParameters%2A>|`initiatorTokenParameters`| |<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.RecipientTokenParameters%2A>|`recipientTokenParameters`| |<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.AllowSerializedSigningTokenOnReply%2A>|`false`|
trans-unit.target: Os seguintes membros são definidos por este construtor: | Membro | Valor | |------------|-----------| | <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.MessageProtectionOrder%2A>| <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessageProtectionOrder>| | <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.RequireSignatureConfirmation%2A>| `false`| | <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.InitiatorTokenParameters%2A>| `initiatorTokenParameters`| | <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.RecipientTokenParameters%2A>| `recipientTokenParameters`| | <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.AllowSerializedSigningTokenOnReply%2A>| `false`|</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.AllowSerializedSigningTokenOnReply%2A></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.RecipientTokenParameters%2A></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.InitiatorTokenParameters%2A></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.RequireSignatureConfirmation%2A></xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessageProtectionOrder></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.MessageProtectionOrder%2A>

trans-unit.source: Defines the token for the recipient (for example the server's X.509 certificate).
trans-unit.target: Define o token para o destinatário (por exemplo o certificado do servidor x.&509;).

trans-unit.source: Defines the token for the initiator (for example, the client's X.509 certificate).
trans-unit.target: Define o token para o iniciador (por exemplo, o cliente x.&509; de certificado).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether serializing a signing token on a reply message is allowed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se é permitido ao serializar um token de assinatura na mensagem de resposta.

trans-unit.source: This flag is intended to enable interoperability with some older implementations of WS-Security (for example, WSE 2.0).
trans-unit.target: Este sinalizador destina-se para permitir a interoperabilidade com algumas implementações mais antigas de WS-segurança (por exemplo, WSE 2.0).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if serializing a signing token on a reply message is allowed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>se serializar uma assinatura de token de uma mensagem de resposta é permitido. caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of this class initialized from the current one.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância desta classe inicializado da atual.

trans-unit.source: This creates a complete copy of the current binding element object tree, also called a deep clone.
trans-unit.target: Esta ação cria uma cópia completa de atual enlace elemento árvore de objetos, também designado por um clone profundo.

trans-unit.source: A deep clone of an object creates a copy of the object and a copy of everything directly or indirectly referenced by that object.
trans-unit.target: Um clone de um objeto profundo cria uma cópia do objeto e uma cópia de tudo direta ou indiretamente referenciado pelo objeto.

trans-unit.source: (This can also be described as copying the entire object graph.) Returning a deep clone enables the runtime to support the case in which multiple custom bindings share a custom binding element.
trans-unit.target: (Isto pode também ser descrito como copiar o gráfico de objeto completa.) Devolver um clone profundo permite que o tempo de execução suportar o cenário em que vários enlaces personalizados partilham um elemento de enlace personalizado.

trans-unit.source: If a deep clone is not returned, the run-time behavior is undefined.
trans-unit.target: Se não for devolvido um clone profundo, o comportamento de tempo de execução é indefinido.

trans-unit.source: A shallow clone of an object, by contrast, is a copy of the object only.
trans-unit.target: Um clone de um objeto, shallow por outro lado, é uma cópia do objeto apenas.

trans-unit.source: If the object contains references to other objects, the shallow copy does not create copies of the referred objects; instead, it copies only the references to the original objects.
trans-unit.target: Se o objecto contém referências a outros objetos, a cópia shallow cria cópias dos objetos referenciados; em vez disso, copia apenas as referências a objetos originais.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement> object with property values equal to those of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement>objeto com valores de propriedade igual da instância atual.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the token definition for the initiator.
trans-unit.target: Especifica a definição de token para o iniciador.

trans-unit.source: This property gets and sets a class that contains the properties for the token of the party that initiates communication.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade obtém e define uma classe que contém as propriedades para o token de terceiros que inicia a comunicação.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters> that holds the token definition.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters>que contém a definição do token.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the order of message encryption and signing for this binding.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a ordem de encriptação de mensagens e assinatura para este enlace.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If there is nothing in the message that is encrypted, the signature element is not encrypted even when the MessageProtectionOrder property is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessageProtectionOrder>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE]> Se nada na mensagem que é encriptada, o elemento de assinatura não está encriptado, mesmo quando a propriedade MessageProtectionOrder está definida como <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessageProtectionOrder>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessageProtectionOrder>

trans-unit.source: This behavior occurs even with system-provided bindings.
trans-unit.target: Este comportamento ocorre mesmo com enlaces fornecidos pelo sistema.

trans-unit.source: However the WSDL generated by [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] still contains the <`sp:EncryptSignature`> assertion.
trans-unit.target: No entanto WSDL gerados pelo [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] ainda contém o `sp:EncryptSignature`> asserção.

trans-unit.source: For a listing of the members and their descriptions, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessageProtectionOrder>.
trans-unit.target: Para uma lista dos membros e as suas descrições, consulte <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessageProtectionOrder>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessageProtectionOrder>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.MessageProtectionOrder"></xref> values that specify how the message is protected.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.MessageProtectionOrder"> </xref> valores que especificar como a mensagem está protegida.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.MessageProtectionOrder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.MessageProtectionOrder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value is not a valid member of the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: O valor não é um membro válido da enumeração.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the token definition for the recipient.
trans-unit.target: Especifica a definição de token para o destinatário.

trans-unit.source: This property gets and sets a class that contains the properties for the token of the party that receives the communication.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade obtém e define uma classe que contém as propriedades para o token de terceiros que recebe a comunicação.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters> that holds the token definition.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters>que contém a definição do token.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether message signatures must be confirmed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se as assinaturas de mensagem tem de ser confirmadas.

trans-unit.source: This property specifies whether the request signatures must be confirmed as part of the response.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade especifica se as assinaturas de pedido tem de ser confirmadas como parte da resposta.

trans-unit.source: If the value is `true`, then the server includes and signs, in the response, all the signatures included in the request.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor for `true`, em seguida, o servidor inclui e inicia sessão na resposta, a todas as assinaturas incluídas no pedido.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if message signatures must be confirmed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se as assinaturas da mensagem tem de ser confirmadas; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sets a value that indicates whether derived keys are required.
trans-unit.target: Define um valor que indica se as chaves derivadas são necessárias.

trans-unit.source: A derived key is created from an existing key and makes it possible to vary the key used in the course of a conversation.
trans-unit.target: Uma chave derivada é criada a partir de uma chave existente e torna possível variar a chave utilizada durante uma conversação.

trans-unit.source: This makes it more difficult for a hacker to decrypt the communication.
trans-unit.target: Isto torna mais difícil um hacker desencriptar a comunicação.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if derived keys are required; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se as chaves derivadas são necessárias; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Exports a custom policy assertion about bindings, which is added to the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) information.
trans-unit.target: Exporta uma asserção de política personalizada sobre enlaces, que é adicionada às informações do Web Services Description Language (WSDL).

trans-unit.source: This method writes binding-related statements into the WSDL information exposed by a particular contract and is used by [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] to communicate to clients the existence of this custom binding element in the binding stack.
trans-unit.target: Este método escreve instruções relacionadas com o enlace para as informações de WSDL expostas por um contrato específico e é utilizado pelo [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] para comunicar com os clientes a existência deste elemento de enlace personalizado na pilha de enlace.

trans-unit.source: This method takes two parameters: the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext> objects.
trans-unit.target: Este método aceita dois parâmetros: o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter>e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext>objetos.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetBindingAssertions%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetMessageBindingAssertions%2A>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetOperationBindingAssertions%2A> methods to obtain collections of policy assertions that have already been exported at various scopes.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetBindingAssertions%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetMessageBindingAssertions%2A>, e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetOperationBindingAssertions%2A>métodos para obter as coleções de asserções de política que já tenham sido exportadas em vários âmbitos.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetOperationBindingAssertions%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetMessageBindingAssertions%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetBindingAssertions%2A>

trans-unit.source: Then use this method to add your own policy assertions to the appropriate collection.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, utilize este método para adicionar as seus próprios asserções de política para a colecção apropriada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.Contract%2A> property exposes the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> for the endpoint that is being exported.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.Contract%2A>propriedade expõe o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>para o ponto final que está a ser exportado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.Contract%2A>

trans-unit.source: This allows this method to correctly scope their exported policy assertions.
trans-unit.target: Isto permite que este método definir o âmbito corretamente as asserções de política exportado.

trans-unit.source: For example, security attributes in code may add behaviors to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> that indicate where security policy assertions should be added.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, atributos de segurança no código podem adicionar comportamentos para o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>que indicar onde asserções de política de segurança devem ser adicionadas.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>

trans-unit.source: Once custom policy assertions are attached to the WSDL information, clients can detect and import the custom binding assertions by implementing an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyImportExtension> interface.
trans-unit.target: Assim que estão anexadas asserções de política personalizada para as informações de WSDL, os clientes conseguem detetar e importar as asserções de enlaces personalizada implementando um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyImportExtension>interface.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyImportExtension>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter"></xref> that you can use to modify the exporting process.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter"> </xref> que pode utilizar para modificar o processo de exportar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext"></xref> that you can use to insert your custom policy assertion.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext"> </xref> que pode utilizar para inserir a asserção de política personalizada.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents this <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma cadeia que representa esta <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: Information returned by ToString includes the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.MessageProtectionOrder%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.RequireSignatureConfirmation%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.RecipientTokenParameters%2A>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.InitiatorTokenParameters%2A> values of the current instance.
